5. Storage: you mention many different storage solutions, is it not easier to use a KU leuven server or onedrive with automatic backup? Contact your local IT team if you like to discuss the most suitable storage for your work or take a look at the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
7. You can now also use KU Leuven RDR for data sharing: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
